item.title: Chicken Nooddle Soup
item.description: INGREDIENTS: 2 tablespoons unsalted butter 1 onion, diced 2 carrots, peeled and diced 2 celery ribs, diced 3 cloves garlic, minced 8 cups chicken stock 2 bay leaves Kosher salt freshly ground black pepper, to taste 2 1/2 pounds bone-in, skinless chicken breasts 2 1/2 cups wide egg noodles 2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley leaves 2 tablespoons chopped fresh dill 1 tablespoon freshly squeezed lemon juice, or more, to taste
